item.description:
Festejamos el cumplea√±os de
Marta Russo & Marta Isabella Bravo de Avellino.

Traer comida y bebida.
Por favor confirmar antes del 28 de julio -
espacio limitado.
(Si no te animas a un disfraz, ponte un sombrero)

Esperamos sirva,

Un beso y mil gracias,
Marta & Claudio


Celebrate the birthdays of Marta Russo and Marta Isabella Bravo de Avellino.

Bring food and drink. Please RSVP by July 28 - space is limited. (If you aren't motivated to wear a costume, you can put on a hat)

Looking forward to seeing you (waiting to serve you)

A kiss and a thousand thanks,

Marta and Claudio

Directions: exit 69 I-84, take a left on the bridge 1 mi to 1243 Tolland Stage Rd (Route 74)
Tolland, CT 06084 (Find here: http://maps.google.co...)

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta de Disfraces
